data.title: MakeCloud: Turbulent GMC initial conditions for GIZMO
data.name: MakeCloud
data.description: MakeCloud: Make turbulent GMC initial conditions for GIZMO

evidence: "Run python MakeCloud.py -h for instructions" indicates it is run as a script/application rather than imported as a library.
Example usage: "python MakeCloud.py --M=1e6 --R=100 --N=1000000" shows it directly generates astrophysical cloud initial conditions, a research result artifact.
README lists only required Python packages and shows direct script execution, with no mention of package managers, releases, or containers, implying distribution via the source repository.
